page.title: 20Project Domesday.
page.content: For the 5th. year children of{South {Cantley First school}and the 3rd years of{Wilby Carr Middle school}the{Summer {term}of{1985}has been busier than usual visits have been made to the golf course,railway station,shops and {Potteric Carr Nature reserve.Traffic {counts}have been made and the results of{questionnaires}studied,the figures being compiled into graphs.To complete the project{a great deal of help}has been given by many people most of whom are listed below. {Mr.Richardson Rossington Colliery {Manager, Mr.Brackenbury Doncaster {Railway Station, Mr.& Mrs. Lister {Manor Farm, Mr.& Mrs. Clarke Pit Hill {Farm, Mr.& Mrs. Badley West {Farm,Yorkshire Water Authority,Mr. {Colley & Mr. Oakley Doncaster Golf {Club,Mr.Batterham and the staff and {pupils of both schools.}
